original: intros. intros H. split. - intros i H0. apply Forall_nth with (d:=f i). rewrite <- H. apply nth_error_map. apply nth_error_an. apply H0. - intros HF. apply map_ext_in_iff. intros a Hin. specialize (HF (nth_error_an 0 n a) (list_an_spec 0 n a)). destruct HF as [HF _]. apply (HF Hin). - intros. apply Forall_map. apply ((proj2 (Forall_impl _ _ _)) H).
